Name: Deeper In The Dark
About the game: You are an elite soldier from the eternal space. You are the last of your kind. Your mission is to clear out the mothership captured by aliens, and blow up the ship. Use your teleport ability to sneak behind sentinels, and dodge aliens. Sum: In the game you have to kill the aliens, buy upgrades and skills, solve puzzle, and sneak behind the sentinels! Other Features: -Secret items, collectables -Creepy Sci-Fi atmosphere -Realistic physics -Skills and abilities -Realistic graphics -Teleport Please note that there are blood and mature contents in this game: -Alien screaming sounds -Scarry atmosphere -Scarry enemies -Blood DO NOT RECOMMENDED FOR CHILDREN
